title: AI Production Strategist (Creative Ops)
summary: Designs and runs brand-safe AI creative production workflows so teams can generate consistent, compliant assets at scale.
whyFutureReady: Work is orchestration + accountability across changing tools (hard to fully automate end-to-end).
Requires brand judgment, QA, and process design.
Combines tool fluency with human taste and compliance awareness.

items: Design end-to-end creative workflows using genAI tools and pro editing software.
Test, evaluate, and deploy new tools; manage test accounts and rollout plans.
Solve practical constraints (access, localization, integrations) and keep workflows stable.
Use genAI for rapid ideation, then refine outputs with hands-on craft.
Enforce brand rules: visual identity, tone, product accuracy, consistency.
Maintain a library of use cases, prompts, and guardrails per brand/campaign.
Evaluate copyright, ethics, and policy risks in AI usage.
Document SOPs, QA rubrics, and best practices.
Train teams and keep the toolkit current via ongoing research.

core: Tool orchestration across multiple genAI models

proofProjects.title: Brand-Safe Workflow SOP
whatYouBuild: Brief → generation → QA rubric → revision loop → deliverables checklist
A small demo pack of consistent assets for a sample brand

proofProjects.title: Use-Case Library
whatYouBuild: 20 use cases with inputs, constraints, examples, and failure modes
Guardrails for common brand risks (logos, text, product fidelity)

proofProjects.title: Compliance + Risk Checklist
whatYouBuild: A practical checklist for rights, ethics, and brand safety
Escalation rules: when to regenerate, when to edit, when to reject

starterPlan30Days: Pick 2 genAI tools you can drive confidently + 1 finishing tool.
Build one end-to-end workflow and document it (SOP + QA rubric).
Produce 10 consistent assets for a sample brand to prove repeatability.
Create a small prompt/use-case library (10 entries) and refine from feedback.
